trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around November 7th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down east willock rd notice bright light in the sky. as i kept on driving down that rd which it leads to street run rd i notice this thing was not moving at all. it took me 4 to 5 minutes to get to the actually spot that it was hovering on dalwar rd as i got under it i notice it was silent and huge with 3 lights that were like a yellowish white color it look to be like a boomerang \ triangle shape to it as i was under it. it moved so slow i didn't take my eyes off it at all that's when i only saw the left side of its shape it was a dark object huge. it was a very clear night it moved so slow then it disappeared which there were no clouds where i was at this time i also was the only car on that rd at the time which was weird its a busy st it was 9:20 pm on november 7 2011.. please call me i have had a total of 3 other things that happened that was very weird in the past that i just can't explain in writing. now that i saw a ufo i can't stop thinking about them weird things that happened before ...
